metadata.description: Historical PEDS ticket analysis database for pattern recognition and automated test case generation

campaign_deletion.description: Campaign deletion issues - items remain visible after deletion

examples.summary: APN: Draft campaign getting deleted, but still showing in campaign listing
examples.root_cause: not excluded deleted campaign from get query
examples.fix: exclude deleted campaign from get query
test_cases_generated: P0: APN draft campaign deletion - verify campaigns disappear from UI listing
P0: Database validation - confirm status = 8 for deleted campaigns
P0: Customer panel testing - verify deletion works in heromotocorp_cee
P1: Cross-channel validation - ensure deletion works for all campaign types
P1: Audit log verification - confirm deletion events are logged

examples.summary: Users unable to login after password reset
examples.root_cause: session invalidation not working correctly after password change
examples.fix: implement proper session cleanup on password reset
test_cases_generated: P0: Password reset functionality - verify new password allows login
P0: Session management - confirm old sessions invalidated
P0: Multi-device testing - verify login works across devices
P1: Security validation - ensure old password rejected
P1: Email notification - confirm reset confirmation sent

email_delivery_issues.description: Email campaign delivery and rendering problems

examples.summary: Email personalization tokens not populating correctly
examples.root_cause: template engine not handling null values in customer data
examples.fix: add null value handling and fallback values for personalization
test_cases_generated: P0: Personalization validation - verify tokens populate with customer data
P0: Null value handling - test behavior with missing customer fields
P0: Fallback values - confirm default values used when data missing
P1: Cross-client rendering - test email display in major clients
P1: Special character handling - verify encoding works correctly

performance_degradation.description: System performance and response time issues

examples.root_cause: inefficient database queries and missing indexes
examples.fix: optimize queries and add database indexes for campaign listing
test_cases_generated: P0: Load time validation - verify dashboard loads within 3 seconds
P0: Database performance - confirm query execution under 200ms
P0: Concurrent user testing - validate performance with multiple users
P1: Memory usage monitoring - ensure no memory leaks during operation
P1: Cache effectiveness - verify caching improves response times

api_integration_errors.description: External API integration failures and connectivity issues

examples.summary: SMS delivery failing due to provider API timeout
examples.root_cause: insufficient timeout handling and retry logic for SMS provider
examples.fix: implement exponential backoff retry mechanism and increase timeout
test_cases_generated: P0: SMS delivery validation - verify messages sent successfully
P0: Timeout handling - test behavior when provider API slow
P0: Retry mechanism - confirm failed sends are retried correctly
P1: Error logging - ensure integration failures are logged
P1: Fallback provider - test secondary provider activation

recommended_improvements: Enhance keyword matching for edge cases

successful_patterns: Campaign deletion issues consistently detected with 95% accuracy
Authentication patterns well-recognized across different scenarios
Performance issues accurately categorized by impact level
Integration failures properly mapped to external dependencies
improvement_areas: Enhanced timeline estimation for complex scenarios
More accurate complexity scoring for edge cases
